item.title: Master Thesis
item.description: Motivation: Have you ever had the curiosity to understand how Donald Trump’s election affected the US’ stock market? More specifically, have you ever wondered how it impacted environmentally responsible and carbon-intensive firms? My thesis focused on answering such questions. The stock market reactions to the below three events were studied: • Donald Trump’s election in 2016 • The nomination of Scott Pruitt to lead the Environmental Protection Agency • The Withdrawal of the U.
